text: It does indeed look like that - i think the text is just the actual text of the CTA (its a test button) so then the question becomes - why does it not generate an image for this mode when it does for all the other clients? :slightly_smiling_face:
Probably need to submit it to support.

Hi guys.
I ran into such a problem here.
I create templates and modules for my emails using hubl.
But after hubl has been rendered in html there are huge gaps that are terrible for email marketing.

Yes. I know you can remove them with {% - -%} {{- -}}
But is this really the only way out?

Why doesn't the hobspot minify the html after rendering?
